title: Flynn Flips, ‘Forrest Gump’ Is In The Air 12.1.17
itunes:title: Flynn Flips, ‘Forrest Gump’ Is In The Air 12.1.17
description:
In episode 39, Jack & Miles are joined by comedian Shelby Fero to discuss cutting boards, Forrest Gump, a broader break down of the GOP tax bill and how it will effect Americans, the weekly tabloid watch, Michael Flynn's guilty plea, & more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
